name: Rio.de.touch
description:
Limited time offer
Hit Hit and Hit！Simple but extremely fun Whack-A-Mole style action game!
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
◆Fun with a lot of mission !

◆Active skill to earn more score!

◆Clear all 24 stage and collect all panel!

All Bgm is classical remix! Relax rhythm but exciting!
Let's Whack-A-Mole with Cools rhythm!!


【Story】
Summer Sport festival ,there is some bad thing happenning....
Everyone is in trouble!! Sport field is changing their shape.
"Noa" who dicover the mystery emblem, is now finding who is behind this mess!
Are we going to get our sport festival back. yours design!

【Noa】
Base on「ReltoKil Series」 main character
A boy who love a books.He has a power to get in to any books he want to.
He is the only one who find out that there is some serios mistake is happening in this book.

【Suima】
「Book's defect」A monster which corntrolling a book world.

【Game Guidance】
「Soccer field」「Golf field」「Sea」「Ice rinks」 etc. all 24 stages.
Reverse all the mess to the normal by clear the mission and kill the Suima.
The stage is clear when you kill the Suima.

【Stage】
Soccer stadium
Athletics stadium
Golf Course
Tennis Course
Beach
Sea
Lake
Sea Road
Archery
Equestrian
Rugby stadium
Fencing
1st Gymnasium(Ball)
2nd Gymnasium(Gymnastics)
Weightlifting stadium
Wrestling stadium
Ice rinks
Boxing
Swimming stadium
Judo Staduim
Taekwondo Staduim
Rifle range
Cycling track
Modern pentathlon field
